headline: Zebra Technologies' Shares Trade At An Appealing Discount Though May Face Economic Uncertainty
summary: Zebra Technologies exited the robotics segment to focus on core markets. Find out why I am recommending ZBRA shares with a Buy rating.

headline: 1 Volatile Stock with Promising Prospects and 2 We Avoid
summary: Volatility cuts both ways - while it creates opportunities, it also increases risk, making sharp declines just as likely as big gains. This unpredictability can shake out even the most experienced investors.
